item.description:
Wednesday Oct 21 2009 at 7 pm - Monster Mini Golf Party

Join Central CT Singles - Meet New Friends - play Monster Mini Golf and Arcade Games- have a great time with us!

Monster Mini Golf is an exciting indoor monster themed glow in the dark 18 hole miniature golf course that offers a host of family-oriented fun activities at every turn. This is not your average putt putt golf course! Whether you're visiting for the first time, or the hundredth, you feel the excitement and adventure of playing mini golf among scary but cool monster décor with custom and animated props.

Monster Mini Golf is fun for the entire family! Our courses are challenging enough for adults to navigate, yet very playable for children. Throughout your stay, you will be entertained by our own in-house crazy DJ.

In addition to miniature golf, each Monster Mini Golf has its own family arcade containing many of today’s most thrilling arcade games. At the end of your play, game award tickets are redeemable for great prizes.

In addition to 18 Holes of Mini Golf they have state of the art Arcade Games, a Glow-in-the-Dark Air Hockey Table and a great assortment of ticket redemption games including glow Skee Balls.

Includes Unlimited Golf and Party Room

Monster Mini Golf
20 Main St. (Dexter Plaza)
Windsor Locks, CT 06096

JOIN THE PARTY! MEET HUNDREDS OF LOCAL SINGLES AND PARTY WITH SinglesCT.com

Advance Tickets are only $10 online at http://www.SinglesCT....
Tickets at the event are $15 SPACE IS LIMITED - RESERVE YOUR SPOT TODAY


RECESSION BUSTER – Only $10 Online or $15 At The Event

Visit http://www.SinglesCT.... or call (860) 236-3343

Saturday October 24 * 8 pm
CLUB SWING with the CT Theatre Group Bushnell Theatre
166 Capitol Avenue Hartford, CT 06106 Get your ADV TIX at our Group Discount Rate

Friday Oct 30 Mohegan Sun Party Bus includes Buffet, $20 $$ + Concert with JOURNEY Tribute
Pickup in South Windsor, Windsor, Glastonbury and Norwich * ADV TIX only $25

Saturday Oct 31 * 8 pm
Galactic Bowling Nite at Spare Time Bristol
- UNLIMTED BOWLING, Snacks, Soda- includes Shoes Spare Time Bristol 177 Farmington Ave (Route 6) Bristol, CT 06010 * Recession Buster: ADV TIX $10 * $15 at door

Sunday Nov 1 * 7 pm
Sunday Nite Dance Party-7pm in the Melody Lane Party Room AGE RANGE- 30's * 40's * 50's
Cherry Street Restaurant 428 S Cherry Street Wallingford, CT 06492
Recession Buster: ADV TIX $7.50 $10 at door includes Appetizers

Saturday Nov 7 * 8 pm
Galactic Bowling Nite at Spare Time Vernon - UNLIMTED BOWLING, Snacks, Soda- includes Shoes
Spare Time Vernon 350 Talcottville Rd (Route 83) Vernon, CT 06066 * Recession Buster: ADV TIX $10 * $15 at door

Visit http://www.SinglesCT.... Call (860) 236-3343
